flawed_nl_solution:
Since each student needs 10 cups of water per day and there are 200 students, the custodian has to provide 200*10 = <<200*10=20000>>20000 cups of water.
A jug of water needs 40 cups to be full, so 20000 cups of water will fill 20000/40 = <<20000/40=500>>500 jugs

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 20000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
